data.message: You most likely not answer because your a snob (😊) jokes 😂 it must be hard to find someone that just likes you for u .I will be auditioning for the voice Australia in the next two years so I can meet you.seems I have to join the music industry to .and I think that's really sad.I'm haven't been hearing your music to long and I know literally nothing about you so I couldnt call myself a fan Ernest but shit friggen auto correct sorry bout that 😜 also not telling u what to do but interaction with your "fans" hardly happens and I'm thinking there should be more of that I have friends that you give there arms and legs to meet you.you seem like your shit don't stink from what I've heard from your music.so I'm determined to meet you in your world to see what u are like in "the real world". I'd love to just see u in my town in Australia because I have a weird feeling if I meet you in your world your gonna think I wanna collaborate and get famous ect there 😂😂. As musicians are doing that already I'd just  just  be another "eagle" sorry I'm not meaning to sound stand offish I just know if I make it past the voice I have time for people that appreciate my lyrics ! That's all I have to say 😘 if you would like to respond if u could inbox as your fans would get jelly because you don't respond to any of them take care of your special gift 😘😘😘
